content: Steven Franconeri: Department of Psychology - Northwestern University Skip to main content HomePeopleFacultyCore FacultyProfilesSteven Franconeri Steven FranconeriProfessorCurriculum Vitaefranconeri@northwestern.eduWebsite847-467-1259Swift 317Research Interests We study visual thinking and communication: how it works, and how we can make it work better. At our Visual Thinking Laboratory, a team of researchers explore how leveraging the visual system - the largest single system in your brain - can help people think, remember, and communicate more efficiently. Our basic research is inspired by real-world problems, guiding our laboratory toward the most interesting theoretical questions, while producing results that translate directly to science, education, design, and industry.
